data.Title: Google Search Algorithm Update Expected Soon
data.Description: Google Search ranking algorithm update and volatility heating up and we are expecting a core update soon(ish). The last core update was the March 2024 core update, any many sites are still waiting since September 2023 to see helpful content recoveries.

data.Title: Google Clarifies Heading Element Best Practices for SEO
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes answered a question about heading elements (H1, H2, etc.) and the best way to use them for SEO

data.Title: How to Verify Your SEO Agency's Work
data.Description: Google's John Mueller shares tips on checking if the SEO company you hired is actually doing the work they promised.

data.Title: Google's Web Crawler Simulates "Idle" State to Improve JavaScript Rendering
data.Description: Google's web crawler now simulates "idle" states to better render JavaScript-heavy websites, improving the indexing of content that loads after initial page rendering.

data.Title: Google Search Notes Experiment Ends
data.Description: Google has discontinued its Notes Search and Discover labs experiment. Google launched Notes in Search 8 months ago as a labs experiment - that experiment ends today.

data.Title: Google Testing Store Ratings in Knowledge Panels
data.Description: Google is now showing store ratings in knowledge panels. Google is displaying store ratings, separate from local star ratings, in knowledge panels.

data.Title: Google Experiments with Renaming "Short Videos" to "Quick Takes"
data.Description: Google is testing renaming "short videos" to "quick takes" in its search results. Google is testing renaming "short videos" to "quick takes".

data.Title: Google Ads Japan Renames "Broad Match" to "Intent Match"
data.Description: Google Ads Japan has renamed broad match to intent match. Google Ads has renamed "broad match" to "intent match" in Japan.

data.Title: Google Ads Tests Query Refinements for Ad Carousels
data.Description: Google Ads is now showing query refinements for ad carousels. Google Ads now shows query refinements for ad carousels.

data.Title: Google Testing AI Overviews on Workspace Accounts
data.Description: Google is testing AI Overviews on Workspace accounts (also in the UK)

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Rolls Out This Month
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now rolling out to all merchants this month
